detectors.description:
Contract locking ether found in :
	Contract DigitalCoin (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/DigitalCoin.sol#85-211) has payable functions:
	 - DigitalCoin.constructor() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/DigitalCoin.sol#96-98)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether
